body:
ShindoL a married woman? Wtf? Lol.
There's an interview on YouTube. He's a very wholesome male:)!!!
I need this translated to english plz :D
@yashi01 Felt bad, fap to his work anyway.

cus people like iexpectedbetter and zerobero are pathetic fags who want to be lost in their little self inserted imaginary incel world of vanilla and harem where every girl only loves their fat selves
Why's people being hatin on shindol god damn. Shindol said that "i created Emergence or any kind of fucked up work of mine in order to bring audience to tears"

Copied from his patreon page - 

Hello!  My name is ShindoL.  I am also known as the sole member of the doujin circle, Da Hootch.  I draw adult oriented manga and illustrations.
I moved from my hometown in Queens, NY to Tokyo to work in the adult manga industry.
For this reason almost all of my work is done in Japanese.  Now, you may not be fluent in Japanese.  That's Okay.  Most of my work has already been pirated, translated, and uploaded online.  You may have seen some of it.  That's cool, I hope you liked what you saw.
Rocker chicks are hot as hell. Also, the perspective in the top left panel of pg 16 is hilariously fucked up
Pretty sure Shindol is a married woman.
Go die Shindol,go get cuck or retired
这可真是，公车变私车可还行。
I remember shindol is a new York dude, his real life picture really doesn't surprise me
